reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs with Wallplate | 150W/Single-Pole or 3-Way | DVWCL-153PH-LA | Light Almond
reviews.text: I had cheaped out and bought a Chinese "clone" of this dimmer switch. It dimmed just fine, but the switch itself was flakey - I mean, who in this day and age has come across a flakey wall switch? I do resent the fact that Lutron charged top dollar for all their switches, and this one is certainly the plainest of the plain jane variety - no soft on/off, no led display, just a switch and a slider. But it just works, so it's worth the cost.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2022
reviews.title: expensive, but worth it

reviews.text: The online product specs as well as on the product package itself claims that the product has a "dimming range lever to improve bulb performance". I searched every inch of the product before putting the faceplate on and there is no such lever. Getting any help on the problem from Lutron's computer system support or a real live customer rep was impossible.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs with Wallplate | 150W/Single-Pole or 3-Way | DVWCL-153PH-LA | Light Almond
reviews.text: I have tried many different styles of dimmers now. I prefer this one over all others because the most-often-use-case (simply toggling the switch on and off) is the easiest activity to do since the dimmer does not change how the decora rocker works fundamentally. Dimming the switch, is more difficult than other dimmers. But I feel this tradeoff is worth it since dimming is done so much less frequently than simply turning it on/off.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2021
reviews.title: Much better than alternative dimmers

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs with Wallplate | 150W/Single-Pole or 3-Way | DVWCL-153PH-LA | Light Almond
reviews.text: Nice looking dimmer / plate. Easy to replace existing 3 way switch. Instructions basically very good and they even note the internal dimmer adjustment may be in 'different' location then shown. All true. But, Dimmer adjustment did not slide, turn, push, pull or move in any direction. Basically SET at factory. I would have liked to dim the lights a wee bit more but will live with the factory setting. Have never had this issue with other dimmers from Lutron.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2020
reviews.title: Dimmer adjustability non-existent.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs with Wallplate | 150W/Single-Pole or 3-Way | DVWCL-153PH-LA | Light Almond
reviews.text: I purchased this dimmer control to replace a 20 year old dimmer. The old dimmer really showed its age when I installed new dimmable LED bulbs with flickering. Now with this new dimmer switch, the LED bulbs can go from zero to 100 percent without flickering. I didn't care for the new style wall plate that came with this switch, so I used the wall plate that was already there without any issues. The Amazon price of $16.26 was only 60% of what Lowe's charges for the exact same thing. Very pleased!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2019
reviews.title: Good LED lamp dimmer

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs with Wallplate | 150W/Single-Pole or 3-Way | DVWCL-153PH-LA | Light Almond
reviews.text: This switch was purchased to replace an older dimmer switch. The older switch was not designed for LED bulbs and with it, dimming range was limited, very sensitive to set and an overall pain. The new switch with the slide dimmer solved those problems. Dimming range has been extended, getting the exact desired light effect right and the ease in doing it all make this switch a keeper. I also like the snap on cover plate which doesn't require screws to attach leading for a cleaner look.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2019
reviews.title: Stylish and functional.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs with Wallplate | 150W/Single-Pole or 3-Way | DVWCL-153PH-LA | Light Almond
reviews.text: I replaced a standard switch in a three switch circuit with one of these dimmers connected to ten ceiling can lights equipped with FEIT Electric 65W LED flood equivalents (11 watts each)-which are actually brighter than the 75 watt incandescent bulbs we replaced with the LEDs-at least to my eye. This dimmer works beautifully with the LED bulbs, without any flickering whatsoever. As with any dimmable LED bulbs, when the bulbs are dimmed, the light emitted becomes a bit whiter and "cooler" than when the bulbs are at a brighter setting, which gives off a warmer light. But that isn't the fault of the dimmer; it just seems to be an inherent issue with LED bulbs generally. I was highly skeptical that a dimmer such as this would work so well with 10 LED flood lights in the dimmer's circuit-but I thought it would give it a try. This dimmer not only met my most optimistic expectations...it greatly exceed my expectations. It was also easy to install (even in a three-switch, four-way circuit), with clear installation instructions. And the best part is that it is a beautiful switch that matched other Lutron switches in our home. I thought that in order to connect a dimmer to that many LED floods, I would need to install an ugly switch that extended from the wall. Not so.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2019
reviews.title: Great Product - Excellent Dimmer for LED Flood Lights

reviews.text: Liked this switch so much, I bought 3 of them for the LED downlighting over the dining room table, kitchen counter and for the LED light strip in the big bathroom. This dimmer switch doesn't take up so much space inside switch box as other higher power models appear to do. Installation and operation is simple and easy. The screw-less switchplate cover is really nice looking too.

reviews.text: Works great. One thing to know, the switch is flush on the front, but takes up a lot of space in the outlet box. Also, they're twist-wire connections, no option for push-in wiring. Compatible with three wire (2+ switch controlling the same circuit) installations. ~Mike
